Name: The Unluckiest Man
About the game: Immerse yourself in the dark tragic-comic adventure of 'The Unluckiest Man', a short free narrative experience with light puzzle elements. Play as Dragomir, a widower who has just lost his beloved wife after a long suffering caused by tuberculosis. Following her death, Dragomir is struggling, having to prepare Catrina's funeral while being completely broke and with no one to help him. Explore your dilapidated house as well as the rest of the fishing town in first person mode, while trying to make sense of the uncomfortable situation you find yourself in. Find keys, collect various items and solve light puzzles to progress the story. Notes are spread around, revealing more about your past and hinting at your future. Talk to the townsfolk and see if they are willing to help you or at least show a bit of compassion. Read the newspaper to delight in some of the city's most exciting gossip. Set in Romania, the game features Romanian voice acting with English subtitles. Check your inventory to see your collected items and read your found notes and newspaper articles.
